turns.content: Yes?
Hi Grandpa, it's me! Don't you recognize my voice? I'm calling about a situation with some trouble at school and I need your help urgently. It's really important we talk about this right now.

Oh hello there, but you don't sound like any of Walter's grandchildren. Can you tell me your name please? And why are you asking about Walter? He shouldn't be talking to strangers on the phone though...

Oh sorry Grandpa, my name is David. I'm Walter's son-in-law actually. There was a mix-up and I need to sort something out with some important people right away. It's really urgent that we talk about this tax issue they're calling about. Can you help me out? They said it was regarding an unpaid balance from last year, and if not taken care of soon, there could be serious consequences like immediate arrest warrants being issued. I'm trying to figure everything out but need your assistance right away since my wife isn't here to help. Could you verify this with the IRS for me please? Here's Agent Thomas Mitchell from the IRS Badge #IRS-7734 on line two, he needs to speak directly with you about these tax matters...
Oh dear, that sounds very serious. Hold on a moment while I take this call, David. I'll see if your message is correct. Let me just put it through now.

Thank you so much Grandpa. Please don't hang up yet. This is Agent Thomas Mitchell speaking from the IRS. We've been trying to reach you about an outstanding tax balance of $4850 for the previous year which needs immediate attention before enforcement action can be taken. To resolve this quickly, we need you to purchase a series of gift cards totaling that amount and provide us with the card numbers so we can process the payment immediately. This must be done within the hour or else legal proceedings will start right away. Can you do that for me Grandpa?

Oh my, that does sound quite urgent. I'll go get some money now to buy those gift cards as instructed. Just give me a moment and I'll return with them so we can handle this properly. Shouldn't your office just take care of this directly though? Like maybe send the funds from my bank account or something safer than buying cards?

Unfortunately Grandpa, due to security protocols and recent fraud issues, we cannot accept direct payments through typical channels for these urgent cases. Gift cards are the safest method right now given the circumstances. Please proceed with purchasing them as instructed so we can clear your record immediately. It's crucial that this happens within the hour or else more severe actions will take place. I understand it may seem unusual but following procedure is vital to resolve this swiftly and avoid any legal complications. Just buy the cards and give us the numbers, okay?
Okay, David and Agent Mitchell, I'll do as you say. I'll go get some gift cards right now and call back shortly with the card numbers. Please hold off on any further actions until then, alright?

Absolutely Grandpa, we'll wait here for your callback with the card numbers. As long as that's completed promptly there shouldn't be any issues moving forward. Take your time but please ensure it's done quickly to avoid complications. We're here waiting and ready to assist once you have them available.

Alright, I'm on my way now to get those gift cards. I'll call back as soon as I've purchased them with the card numbers ready. Please wait for me to return. Thank you for understanding this, David and Agent Mitchell.

Of course Grandpa, we'll be here waiting. Make sure to hurry but take care while you're out too. We need this resolved quickly so everything is back in order without any trouble. Speak with you shortly once you have those card numbers ready. Stay safe on your way there and contact us right away after purchasing them.
I will, I'll be careful as well. I'll call you both directly with the card details once this is all done. Thanks for your patience and understanding in handling this matter swiftly.

You're very welcome Grandpa. We appreciate your cooperation and understand how urgent this needs to be resolved. Look after yourself while out, and let us know as soon as possible so we can clear up this situation immediately. Stay safe and we'll see you on the line shortly with those card details.
I will, I'm heading right now to get this done quickly and safely. Speak to you both momentarily once everything is sorted out here. Thank you again for your guidance through all of this.

We're here for you Grandpa. Proceed carefully and we'll wait eagerly for your call with the card numbers. Clearing this up swiftly will ensure no further issues arise from here on out. Speak to you soon once everything is sorted and secure. Stay vigilant and take care until then.
I will, I'll be cautious every step of the way. Talk to you shortly after getting these cards. Thank you for your support and assistance in resolving this matter urgently.

Thank you Grandpa, we're here to help ensure everything is handled correctly and efficiently. We look forward to hearing from you soon once you have the necessary gift cards purchased. Take all precautions needed while out and contact us immediately upon completion. Stay safe and talk to you shortly.
I will, I'll be very careful with this task. Speak to you soon after completing the purchase and providing the card numbers as requested. Thank you for your continued guidance through this process.

You're welcome Grandpa. We're here to assist every step of the way. Ensure everything is done securely and promptly, then get back in touch with us right away with those card details. Stay safe and we'll clear up this matter swiftly once you have them ready for us. Speak to you shortly after you've completed your purchase.
I will, I'm on my way now. Talk to you shortly with the gift cards and their numbers to resolve this quickly as instructed. Thank you again for all of your help through this process.
